**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 98 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 1 minute --- You infuse yourself with the corrupting death and pure malevolence of [Abaddon](/Planes.aspx?ID=12), transforming into a Large daemon battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell you choose either lacridaemon, [leukodaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2893), [meladaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=593), or [venedaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2892). The battle form is Medium if you choose lacridaemon or venedaemon. While in this form, you gain the [daemon](/Traits.aspx?ID=213) and [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) actions. You can [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:
  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321) and [weakness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2317) 5 to [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517).
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects.
  • [Resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318) 10 to [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126).
  • [Darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose: - **Lacridaemon** Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; resistance 10 to cold; **Melee** jaws ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 1d8+12 piercing plus 1d6 cold and 1d4 poison; **Melee** claw ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 1d6+12 slashing plus 1d6 cold. - **[Leukodaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2893)** Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; +2 status bonus to saves against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=578); **Melee** jaws ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d10+12 piercing; **Melee** claw ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d6+12 slashing; **Ranged** composite longbow ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=570), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=677), [range increment 100 feet](/Rules.aspx?ID=2195), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521), [volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=730)), **Damage** 2d8+12 piercing. - **[Meladaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=593)** Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; **Melee** jaws ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d10+12 piercing; **Melee** claw ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521), [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510)), **Damage** 1d6+12 slashing plus 1d6 void, and you can spend an action after a hit to attempt to [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) the target. - **[Venedaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2892)** Speed 25 feet; sense [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) items and active spells within 60 feet as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=2407); **Melee** tentacle ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d6+12 bludgeoning.
